importantArticles.headline: Wyndham Rewards members looking to set sail on a Carnival cruise now have a new way to book and save. Starting today, Wyndham Rewards members can book Carnival Cruise Line vacations through Wyndham Travel Bundles, making it easier than ever to plan an entire trip while earning Wyndham Rewards points for every aspect of their booking.
importantArticles.title: Set Sail for Fun: Wyndham Rewards Now Offers Points and Special Discounts on Carnival Cruise Line Bookings

importantArticles.headline: Marking an exciting new chapter for Carnival Cruise Line as Australia's leading cruise operator, Carnival Adventure and Carnival Encounter are preparing to embark on their maiden voyages, delivering more signature Carnival fun to guests departing from Sydney and Brisbane. With the addition of these two ships, Carnival Cruise Line now has the largest fleet of ships in its 53-year history, totaling 29 ships.
importantArticles.title: G'DAY, CARNIVAL ADVENTURE AND CARNIVAL ENCOUNTER! TWO SHIPS OFFICIALLY JOIN CARNIVAL FLEET IN AUSTRALIA
